verbs.description: [V: skilling] [ARGM-LOC: out of prison] [ARGM-PRD: sent to halfway house in undisclosed location] jeffrey k skilling the former ceo of enron corp was released from a minimum security prison camp in alabama to a halfway house at an undisclosed location jeffrey skilling federal bureau of prisons
